text: Adam Douglas Driver (born November 19, 1983)Indiana Births, 1905 - 1995, Adam Driver is an American actor. He is best known for his roles in the TV show Girls and the Star Wars movies. == Background == Adam Driver was born in California. The Driver family has roots in Arkansas and Tennessee, where they owned slaves. He grew up in Indiana and joined the United States Marine Corps after the September 11 attacks. He was excited to fight the Iraq War, but could not join direct combat because of an injury. He then went to Juilliard School, an elite school for performing arts, to begin his acting career. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
